prompts: Joining a new fitness class, Mia wishes to change being overweight and achieve her fitness goals. Is this situation appropriate? Yes or No.

prompts: During a family dinner, Mia sits down, grabs a plate of food, and begins eating. Is this situation appropriate? Yes or No.
